title: Seasonal Merch
description: Developed & maintain the ecommerce site using React, Tailwind, Firebase, NodeJS, ExpressJS. Includes an admin page and full functionality for an in-depth ecommerce experience.

title: AI Email Scribe
description: Created frontend, API, and Google Chrome extension to help write emails quicker and more accurately. (API is not currently active)

title: Faces+
description: Built using Unity Game Engine, this simple yet infuriating game was enjoyed internationally by over 30,000 players! (Game is not currently on iOS App Stores)

title: Style-able Text Editor
description: Built using Java & Java Swing for the purpose of taking notes in class. Supports many actions like inserting symbols, saving as many file types, etc.

title: Starship Versus
description: Built for a client using Unity Game Engine and published to the market.
